channel.title: GROMACS Simulations on PyMOL Notes
channel.description: Recent content in GROMACS Simulations on PyMOL Notes

item.title: Protein-Ligand Complex Tutorial
item.description: This tutorial is from this website. Download 3HTB from the RCSB website. View the structure in VMD. cd ../gromacs-work/gromacs-prot-ligand-tutorial mol new 3htb.pdb mol modstyle 0 0 licorice A few of the amino acids have 2 conformers that are present in the structure. Strip out the crystal waters, PO4, and BME. awk '!(/HETATM/ && /HOH/ || /HETATM/ && /BME/ || /HETATM/ && /PO4/)' 3htb.
